divs: Sighting DetailsI was 14 years old and was outside with friends playing in the road in front of my house when i happend to notice a single red light comming strait toward us. It was traveling parrelell to the road in front of my house. As it came closer I could tell that it was made up of 6 or 8 red lights that made the shape of either a hexagon or an octagon. When it got strait above me it seemed to have launched a single red lighted object at a 90 degree angle to the main object. The main object continued due west and the other to the south. I watched both objects continue untill thay faded out of sight Please let me know if there has ever been a report like this one Thank you Ray Williams
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around July 15th 1982
Summary: Octagon shape made up of red lights that launched another red object at a 90 degree angle.
